name: SeaSea
description:
Sea Sea is a Game made for the #TeamSeas Youtubers movement to help the world by cleaning 30M pounds of trash from the sea. you can be a part of this by donating by following the link:

https://teamseas.org/

Cleaning the sea is a very hard problem but I found a quicker way to do it, let’s blast the trash in the sky before hitting the sea. Genius Right!!

And you can do all that in this small mini-game no hidden mechanics no nothing just blast the trash out of the sky and gather as many pounds as you can.

 

Controls: just the mouse left click and your finger.

Dev Log:

Project Files on my Patreon:

https://www.patreon.com/Fadrik

PS: This is a FanMade Game not associated with the guys at #TeamSeas
